alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 8:15PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Ziebach County, Haakon County, Northern Jackson County, Bennett County, Southern Oglala Lakota County and Southern Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation and the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Haakon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota; Ziebach
